Rationale: The quote indicates a transformative impact on work routine, suggesting the tool enables uninterrupted and immersive coding sessions characteristic of flow state
Describes a significant positive change in daily workflow, indicating the tool facilitates entering and maintaining flow state during development

The AI agent mimics human error patterns, providing feedback similar to peer review but requiring the same vigilance as reviewing senior developer code
